kpi.name: M1002C584

kpi_info.title: HS-DSCH SETUP FAILURE DUE TO BTS FOR STREAMING
kpi_info.use: The number of HS-DSCH setup failures due to BTS in the SRNC for streaming class connections. UPDATED: When the RNC receives an NBAP: RADIO LINK RECONFIGURATION FAILURE or NBAP: RADIO LINK SETUP FAILURE message during the transition to HS-DSCH or a timer waiting for the acknowledgement message to expire.

kpi.kpi_alias: HS-DSCH SETUP FAILURE DUE TO BTS FOR STREAMING
